title: Juan Curriculum Vitae
name: Juan Esteban Millan
summary: Full Stack Engineer who actually likes improving legacy projects. For over a decade, I've been digging under the hood of complex systems—payment platforms handling millions in transactions, digital twin infrastructure, and enterprise accounting tools. I've learned that code is just a tool; my real job is making sure the underlying system is reliable enough that the technology becomes invisible to the people using it. I enjoy tracking down bottlenecks, untangling legacy code, and rethinking architecture so it's not just faster—but easier for the next developer. I've worked with distributed teams across different continents, cultures, and time zones.

jobs.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: Senior Full-Stack Engineer with extensive experience at Square1, Europe's leading digital transformation agency and world's first Stripe-Certified Agency Partner. Specialized in architecting scalable multi-tenant e-commerce platforms and complex payment systems for enterprise clients. Proven technical leader in payment processing, framework modernization, and team mentorship across international teams.
tasks: Stripe and PayPal integration specialist with hands-on experience on enterprise payment platforms serving millions in annual transactions.
Led Laravel framework upgrades (5→12), Docker containerization projects, and infrastructure improvements reducing deployment time by 60%.
Built reusable Laravel/Illuminate components and Laminas-based enterprise libraries supporting multi-tenancy, payment processing, and content distribution across projects.
Designed and delivered practical curriculum at University of Antioquia through Square1 Academy, bridging theoretical knowledge with industry-ready technical skills while mentoring student developers.

jobs.title: Development Engineer
jobs.description: Improved the performance and reliability of high-volume payment processing systems through systematic profiling, bottleneck analysis, and strategic code optimization.
tasks: Leveraged Tideways and XHProf to identify bottlenecks in payment processing pipelines, then implemented targeted optimizations that measurably reduced processing latency and increased transaction throughput across high-volume payment flows.

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description: Contributed to YouBIM's Digital Twin platform, a comprehensive facility management and BIM (Building Information Modeling) solution designed to modernize maintenance operations and streamline facility data integration. Worked on core backend systems that power YouBIM's integrated suite of products.
tasks: Developed and maintained API endpoints and backend services supporting real-time facility data management, maintenance workflow automation, and 3D model integration.
Built database solutions enabling seamless integration of BIM models, equipment history, maintenance records, and compliance tracking across enterprise facility management platforms.

Collaborated with full-stack teams to deliver user-friendly digital twin infrastructure that simplifies complex facility operations for maintenance managers, operations directors, and BIM consultants.
Contributed to backend architecture for automated maintenance alerts, work order management systems, and compliance reporting features.

jobs.title: Full Stack Engineer
jobs.description: Freelance full stack engineer building custom web solutions during the early days of remote work. Created static sites, WordPress platforms, and provided technical consulting.
tasks: Built custom WordPress themes and plugins for small business clients, delivering tailored CMS solutions with intuitive admin interfaces.
Developed static websites and landing pages optimized for performance and SEO.
Provided technical consulting and maintenance services for existing web applications.

jobs.title: Software Developer
jobs.description: Engineered and maintained enterprise-grade accounting software solutions with emphasis on regulatory compliance, system optimization, and legacy system modernization to enhance operational efficiency and ensure adherence to international financial reporting standards.
tasks: Provided comprehensive technical support and conducted systematic analysis of accounting systems, implementing strategic enhancements to optimize system performance and improve end-user experience.
Designed and implemented system integrations in accordance with International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS), ensuring full regulatory compliance and standardized financial reporting practices.
Directed modernization initiatives for legacy applications, enhancing code quality, refining system architecture, and improving long-term maintainability while systematically reducing technical debt.
